title: Palmyra
description: An ancient oasis and trading city with monumental remains, located in modern Syria. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1980.

properties.description: Temple of Ba'al in the Ancient City of Palmyra. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in November 2012, following description in UNESCO World Heritage List.
properties.title: Temple of Ba'al

properties.description: An ancient city in central Syria. Location verified by eye in Google Earth in September 2012. Dates after BAtlas.
